result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James A. GALLAS

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.   
State moves to dismiss and read in these charges, the defendant entered pleas in Case Files 14 CF 334 and 14 CF 206.  Motion granted.   
$100.00 cash bail applied to court costs in 14 CF 206.  
Minutes.
Plea date reset to 02-03-15 at 4:00 p.m.
Plea date is reset to 02-02-15 at 4:00 p.m.
Plea date is set for 11-14-14 at 2:30 p.m.

Order for Modifying Defendant's Bail.
It is hereby ordered, based on the request of the alleged victim, Kari Schumacher, the no contact order is amended to allow the defendnat to have non-assaultive contact with Kari Schumacher.
Copy to jail.
Notice of hearing scheduled for 11-18-2014 @ 9:00 a.m. BR-1.
Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 08-15-14 at 11:00 a.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 07-23-14 at 2:45 p.m.  
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for James A. GALLAS
Current: 2000 Johnston Drive #82, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 07-10-2014)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

$100.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Notice to Party Furnishng Cash Bail Bond

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of 8 counts bail jumping.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 07-14-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $100.00 cash with the conditions that he maintain absolute sobriety and have no contact with Kari Schumacher. Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued. Copy filed.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
